com.tangentum.phonetix
Class LowerCase

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.tangentum.phonetix.PhoneticEncoder
        |
        +--com.tangentum.phonetix.LowerCase
public final class LowerCase
extends PhoneticEncoder

Encoder implementing lower-case copy of given words. Therefore no phonetic encoding takes place here.

Author:
Claus Engel
See Also:
Exact, UpperCase
